title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the search does not return any results.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. However, when searching for declarations, the fully qualified name is not found.
EB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Right-click and choose 'Search' from the context menu.
4. In the Search dialog, enter a declaration to search for.
5. Click on 'Search'.
